name: royal-media
description: Royal Media - A modern social media platform

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:services && npm run install:apps
scripts.install:services: cd apps/auth && npm install && cd ../posts && npm install && cd ../..
scripts.build:all: npm run build:services && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:services: cd apps/auth && npm run build && cd ../posts && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build:apps: cd apps/web && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.test: npm run test:services && npm run test:apps
scripts.test:services: cd apps/auth && npm test && cd ../posts && npm test && cd ../..
scripts.lint: npm run lint:services && npm run lint:apps
scripts.lint:services: cd apps/auth && npm run lint && cd ../posts && npm run lint && cd ../..
scripts.lint:apps: cd apps/web && npm run lint && cd ../..

author: Royal Media Team
